Pre-Game Insights: Utah went 31-51 overall, 16-36 in Western Conference play and 21-20 at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Jazz allowed opponents to score 120.5 points per game and shoot 48.7% from the field last season.
Memphis finished 27-55 overall and 14-37 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
The Grizzlies averaged 105.8 points per game while allowing opponents to score 112.8 last season.

Injuries: Isaiah Collier (day to day, hamstring) for the Jazz; Jaren Jackson Jr. (day to day, hamstring), Luke Kennard (day to day, foot) and Vince Williams Jr. (leg), GG Jackson II (foot) for the Grizzlies.
